title: Event >> COVID-19 VACCINATION
cleaned_text: on 15/03/2021 for Covid-19. All the educational and non-teaching employees of Baba Mastnath University were vaccinated by the team of the Civil General Hospital for protection against Covid-19 as directed by the District Officer. University Vice Chancellor Prof. Ramsajan Pandey told about the vaccination that all of us should get vaccinated and avoid the misleading assumption. It is completely safe. The Administrator, Anjana Rao said in her statement while getting the vaccination done that for the past one year we were facing this epidemic. With the untiring efforts of the government and the support of doctors, today it has been realized that the vaccine is being made available to the common man. This vaccine is completely safe and has no side effects. Dr Promila Arya, Principal, Shri Baba Masnath Ayurvedic college said in her statement, that for the past one year, the doctors and all the employees of Shri Baba Mastnath Hospital are serving as Corona Warriors. Medical personnel also successfully carried out the responsibility of the Quarantine Center and the Covid-19 Center during the lockdown. Today, all these corona warriors also got the benefit of the vaccine. Shri Baba Mastnath Hospital is providing its vital services in the field of Ayurveda, Yoga, Naturopathy, Dental, Physiotherapy and Medicine & Surgery in the city of Rohtak. On this occasion, the Registrar of the University Prof. Satish Chandra Sharma, Controller of Examinations OP Sachdeva, the Principal of all the departments, and the staff members were present. 211 members got vaccinated in the hospital.
